title: Advise on Traditional IRA vs. Roth IRA
description: A young professional wants to know whether they should contribute to a traditional IRA (tax-deductible now) or a Roth IRA (tax-free withdrawals in retirement).

tasks.description: Analyze the individual's current income, tax bracket, and eligibility for each type of IRA.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers financial data and checks IRA contribution limits and phase-outs.

tasks.description: Discuss the individual's expected future income and tax bracket.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent helps the client think about their long-term financial trajectory.

tasks.description: Provide a recommendation based on whether it's better to take the tax deduction now (Traditional) or have tax-free growth later (Roth).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent recommends a Roth IRA, as the client is currently in a lower tax bracket than they are likely to be in the future.
